info.author: Six Feet Up, Inc.
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============

Allow local site managers to override portal_properties property sheets.  This setup will allow you to override just one property or all properties if you choose.

The 0.x releases are a proof of concept, a rewrite may be in its future :)


Changelog
=========

0.3 (2012-11-26)
----------------

- Make FakePropertySheet subclass Persistent, to satisfy
  new requirements for getToolByName in Products.PloneHotfix20121106.
  [davidblewett]

- Don't proxy special attributes, persistence attributes, or
  IObjectManager attributes.  Fixes problem with tests and
  collective.lineage issue #41:
  http://plone.org/products/collective-lineage/issues/41
  [rossp]

0.2 (2011-09-02)
----------------

- Fix issue with the `text` property type.
  [claytron]

- Added a new dependency on collective.autopermission.
  Added a new permission (collective.proxyproperties.ManageProperties).
  Gave the Manager role this new permission by default.
  Updated the proxyprops_edit view to require this new permission.
  [davidblewett]

0.1 - (2009-07-10)
------------------

- Initial release
info.name: collective.proxyproperties
info.summary: Local utility to set portal properties for a sub site
info.html_description:
Introduction

Allow local site managers to override portal_properties property sheets. This setup will allow you to override just one property or all properties if you choose.

The 0.x releases are a proof of concept, a rewrite may be in its future :)

Changelog

0.3 (2012-11-26)

  • Make FakePropertySheet subclass Persistent, to satisfy new requirements for getToolByName in Products.PloneHotfix20121106. [davidblewett]
  • Don’t proxy special attributes, persistence attributes, or IObjectManager attributes. Fixes problem with tests and collective.lineage issue #41: http://plone.org/products/collective-lineage/issues/41 [rossp]

0.2 (2011-09-02)

  • Fix issue with the text property type. [claytron]
  • Added a new dependency on collective.autopermission. Added a new permission (collective.proxyproperties.ManageProperties). Gave the Manager role this new permission by default. Updated the proxyprops_edit view to require this new permission. [davidblewett]

0.1 - (2009-07-10)

  • Initial release
